title: No official shop in Pakistan and big brand not in developing country ..no shop , no review unit ?why
content: So far pixel is now in list of one of the best phone's in world, but not in a developing country like Pakistan why here people buy budget smartphone, flagship smartphone but one of the big brand google has not launch it in Pakistan no official store..I am a YouTuber and watch YouTube and many YouTuber's got review unit which help u to sell your mobile in that country which is called marketing..but u haven't send any person an review unit in Pakistan and ask his opinions to launch pixel in that country..even u have launch pixel in India, so why not in Pakistan..i want to use pixel in my hand but can't...one of my favorite phone in 2019..u guys can send me an review unit so i can tell u that are people interested in Pakistan to buy this phone, if can't send review unit please open an official shop in Pakistan ...Google/Pixel lover...
